conclusion: To find the magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground, consider the forces acting on the sled and the child.
The total mass of the sled and the child is 40 kg.
The gravitational force acting on them is 400 N.
The force exerted by the adult is 100 N at an angle of 37 degrees above the horizontal.
The vertical component of the pulling force is 60 N, which acts upwards.
The net force acting on the sled and the child in the vertical direction is 340 N.
The force exerted by the ground on the sled is 340 N, which is also the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground.
The magnitude of the pressure exerted by the sled on the ground is 340 N.
